text: Anante Mosese'a amanage huno Aronine tare mofavre'arare Eleasane, Itamarinena zamasmi'ne, Ama zankura tamasunkura huta tamazokate'ma refite'naza tavrave eritrege, kukenatamia tagotora osiho, ru ete frisageno Ra Anumzamo'a mika vahekura arimpa ahezamantegahie. Hianagi mika Israeli vahe'mo'za Ra Anumzamo'ma tevereti'ma znahe fri'nea netretrenkura amane zavira ategahaze.
